Uses of Class
searcher.IndexingError

  • Packages that use IndexingError 
    Package Description
    searcher
    Searchers are objects that aim to solve the "find kth element" problem from the lecture.

      int SimpleSearcher.findElement()
      Find the kth largest element in an array of ints using the "obvious" solution from the lecture Sort the array Return the entry k spaces from the end
      abstract int Searcher.findElement()
      Find the kth largest entry in the array
      int CleverSearcher.findElement()
      Get the k largest element in a more efficient way The new value from the big array is slotted into the correct position "by hand"
